name: dpa-s3push-transform
description: An example to integrate s3push via serverless into the customers AWS account via a lambda function for transformation.
author: dpa-IT Services GmbH

scripts.s3push-sqs:deploy: cd sqs_receive; npm run s3push-sqs-deploy; cd ..
scripts.s3push-sqs:remove: cd sqs_receive; npm run s3push-sqs-remove; cd ..
scripts.nitf-transform:deploy: cd nitf_transform; npm run transform-deploy; cd ..
scripts.nitf-transform:test: cd nitf_transform; npm run test; cd ..
scripts.nitf-transform:remove: cd nitf_transform; npm run transform-remove; cd ..
scripts.s3push-deploy: npm run s3push-sqs:deploy; npm run nitf-transform:deploy
scripts.s3push-remove: npm run s3push-sqs:remove; npm run nitf-transform:remove;
